messages.content: You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using JavaScript (Node.js) and the Express.js framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. To initiate this process, I'll provide you with the path to a file, your task is to determine whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints, rather than just project configuration, feature implementation, database operations, unit tests, or functional tests. You need to follow the structured output, including an indication of whether this file contains API entries and the reasoning behind your judgment.

contains_api_entries.description: Whether it is possible for this file to contain definitions of REST API endpoints.
contains_api_entries.title: Contains Api Entries

message.content: {"contains_api_entries":true,"reason":"The file is in controllers/ and named invoices.js â€” in typical Express MVC projects controller files implement request handlers for a resource (invoices) and often export functions like get/create/update/delete or even mount an Express Router with route handlers. While route definitions can sometimes live in separate routes files, controllers frequently contain the REST endpoint handler code (usage of req, res, next) or Router definitions, so it is plausible this file contains API endpoint implementations."}
